mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT i.*, CASE WHEN i.inquiry_type = 'A' THEN r.user_id WHEN i.inquiry_type = 'B' THEN b.business_id END AS user_id, b.business_id FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN regular_user r ON i.inquiry_type = 'A' AND i.inquiry_ref_idx = r.idx LEFT JOIN business_user b ON i.inquiry_type = 'B' AND i.inquiry_ref_idx = b.business_idx WHERE i.inquiry_type = #{usertype} AND i.inquiry_ref_idx = #{idx} ORDER BY i.inquiry_idx DESC ) j LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
